description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Protect earth from the Retrovaders and see if you can become the Top Earth Defender. Includes global highscore tables. Note: from 9th February 2011 all profits from Retrovaders goes to charity
